verses.verse: <S%G80>Brethren,<s%> my heart's <S%G2107>desire<s%> and my <S%G1162>prayer<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> for them is for [their] <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
For I <S%G3140>bear<s%> them <S%G3140>witness<s%> that they <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2205>zeal<s%> for <S%G2316>God,<s%> but not in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with <S%G1922>knowledge.<s%>

For not <S%G50>knowing<s%> about <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G2476>establish<s%> their <S%G2398>own,<s%> they did not <S%G5293>subject<s%> themselves to the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of God.
For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G5056>end<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> for <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4100>believes.<s%>

For <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1125>writes<s%> that the <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G4160>practices<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is <S%G1537>based<s%> on <S%G3551>law<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> by that <S%G846>righteousness.<s%>

But the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G1537>based<s%> on <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>speaks<s%> <S%G3779>thus,<s%> "Do not <S%G3004>say<s%> in your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G5101>'Who<s%> will <S%G305>ascend<s%> into <S%G3772>heaven<s%>?' (that is, to <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%>),
<S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>'Who<s%> will <S%G2597>descend<s%> into the <S%G12>abyss<s%>?' (that is, to <S%G321>bring<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> up from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>). "

But <S%G5101>what<s%> does it <S%G3004>say<s%>? "The <S%G4487>word<s%> is <S%G1451>near<s%> you, in your <S%G4750>mouth<s%> and in your <S%G2588>heart<s%>" â€“ that is, the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we are <S%G2784>preaching,<s%>

that <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G3670>confess<s%> with your <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> [as] <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G4100>believe<s%> in your <S%G2588>heart<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> Him from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> you shall be <S%G4982>saved;<s%>

for with the <S%G2588>heart<s%> man <S%G4100>believes,<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and with the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> he <S%G3670>confesses,<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
For the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G3956>"Whoever<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him will not be <S%G2617>disappointed.<s%>"

For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>distinction<s%> between <S%G2453>Jew<s%> and <S%G1672>Greek;<s%> for the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2962>[Lord<s%>] is Lord of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G4147>abounding<s%> in <S%G4147>riches<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G1941>call<s%> upon Him;
for <S%G3956>"Whoever<s%> will <S%G1941>call<s%> upon the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>"

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall they <S%G1941>call<s%> upon Him in <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have not <S%G4100>believed<s%>? And <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him <S%G3739>whom<s%> they have not <S%G191>heard<s%>? And <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G2784>preacher<s%>?

And <S%G4459>how<s%> shall they <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they are <S%G649>sent<s%>? <S%G2509>Just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G5613>"How<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> are the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G2097>glad<s%> <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>things!<s%>"

<S%G235>However,<s%> they did not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5219>heed<s%> the <S%G2098>glad<s%> <S%G2098>tidings;<s%> for <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4100>believed<s%> our <S%G189>report<s%>? "
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> [comes] from <S%G189>hearing,<s%> and <S%G189>hearing<s%> by the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3361>surely<s%> they have <S%G3361>never<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> have they? <S%G3304>Indeed<s%> they have; "Their <S%G5353>voice<s%> has <S%G1831>gone<s%> out into <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> And their <S%G4487>words<s%> to the <S%G4009>ends<s%> of the <S%G3625>world.<s%>"

But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3361>surely<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> did not <S%G1097>know,<s%> did they? At the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I will <S%G3863>make<s%> you <S%G3863>jealous<s%> by that which is not a <S%G1484>nation,<s%> By a <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G801>without<s%> <S%G801>understanding<s%> will I <S%G3949>anger<s%> you."

And <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> is <S%G662>very<s%> <S%G662>bold<s%> and <S%G3004>says,<s%> "I was <S%G2147>found<s%> by <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2212>sought<s%> Me not, I <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G1717>manifest<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who did not <S%G1905>ask<s%> for Me."

But as for <S%G2474>Israel<s%> He <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G3650>"All<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> long I have <S%G1600>stretched<s%> out My <S%G5495>hands<s%> to a <S%G544>disobedient<s%> and <S%G483>obstinate<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
